context: Hi, what kind of movies do you like?
I like romantic movies Like The Notebook (2004)
Lady Bird (2017) and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017) from last year were good romantic movies!
I havent seen either of those. I will have to check them out!
resp: You should! And of course La La Land (2016) and Love Actually (2003)
